description: Reading is a powerful habit for personal growth, learning, and escaping into other worlds. Whether it's fiction, non-fiction, or audiobooks, there's a book for everyone.
sentences: Reading for just 20-30 minutes a day can have significant benefits.
Joining a book club can enhance your reading experience.
Explore both Indian and international authors.
Audiobooks are a great way to 'read' while commuting or doing chores.
Libraries are a free and valuable resource for books.
dos: Set a reading goal for the year.
Read books on topics outside your immediate interests.
Keep a list of books you want to read.
donts: Don't force yourself to finish a book you're not enjoying.
Don't buy books you'll never read.
Avoid comparing your reading speed or quantity with others.
Don't be intimidated by 'classic' literature; read what you enjoy.
